title: Indian Style Font
content:
Hello - can anyone ID the font in my pic + possibly suggest any good fonts that would suit a piece about a fun adventure across India?

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2009-10-13 at 20.23.45.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110611054041/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202009-10-13%20at%2020.23.45.jpg) | 40.24 KB |
author: simonpalf

comments.content: I rotated your picture, selected the larger letters, made the image grayscale, then used [WTF](http://web.archive.org/web/20110611054041/http:/new.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/) to identify the typeface as [Ortem](http://web.archive.org/web/20110611054041/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/ortem/).
